page.title: 12ACTIVITIES IN BRADWELL
page.content: Bradwell Village has many activities and clubs .There are two pubs and a social club along with tennis courts, bowling green,cricket pitch and a football pitch.Although it has all these it's mainly a housing estate with only one shop .There are also two schools and a playgroup, there are 400 pupils at the middle school.There are many community activities held at the middle school, such as Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts.There are also allotments and a small church which is used by people on a Sunday.The allotments are used mainly by retired people who don't have gardens of their own.There is little trouble in Bradwell,meaning vandalism, because there are clubs which everyone enjoys so it keep them occupied.There are lots of parks for the younger people.
